query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `iot_maintenance_work_orders` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `work_order_number` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` text,
  `device_id` int NOT NULL,
  `prediction_id` int,
  `schedule_id` int,
  `work_order_type` enum('predictive','preventive','corrective','emergency','inspection') NOT NULL,
  `priority` enum('low','medium','high','critical') DEFAULT 'medium',
  `status` enum('created','assigned','in_progress','on_hold','completed','cancelled','verified') DEFAULT 'created',
  `estimated_duration` int DEFAULT 60,
  `actual_duration` int,
  `estimated_cost` decimal(12,2),
  `actual_cost` decimal(12,2),
  `required_skills` json,
  `required_parts` json,
  `assigned_to` int,
  `assigned_team` varchar(100),
  `assigned_at` timestamp NULL,
  `started_at` timestamp NULL,
  `completed_at` timestamp NULL,
  `verified_by` int,
  `verified_at` timestamp NULL,
  `due_date` timestamp NULL,
  `completion_notes` text,
  `root_cause` text,
  `actions_taken` text,
  `preventive_measures` text,
  `attachments` json,
  `created_by` int,
  `created_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updated_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX `idx_wo_number` (`work_order_number`),
  INDEX `idx_wo_device` (`device_id`),
  INDEX `idx_wo_status` (`status`),
  INDEX `idx_wo_priority` (`priority`),
  INDEX `idx_wo_assigned` (`assigned_to`),
  INDEX `idx_wo_due_date` (`due_date`)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `iot_maintenance_work_orders` (

  `estimated_duration` int DEFAULT 60,

  `created_by` int,
  `created_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,

  INDEX `idx_wo_number` (`work_order_number`),
